xmppList.content:
Initiator: sends a SYN request to the receiver
Receiver: sends a SYN/ACK which acknowledges the SYN from the Initiator and sends a SYN request as well
Initiator: Sends an ACK acknowledging the SYN of the Receiver
Connection established.
